accounts.name: whitelist
docs: Append-only program level instantiation image registry for the ZK-TEE functionality

accounts.name: image
docs: COntains the id for ZK-program and TEE-program to be matched against

accounts.name: amm_config
docs: Which config the pool belongs to (Can only be created by Raydium Protocol Authority :/)

accounts.name: native_mint
docs: "Mint 0". Instruction supports SPL-Token only (no Token2022 and later support)

accounts.name: mint
docs: "Mint 1". Mint account for created Token

accounts.name: lp_token
docs: User's lp token account that will be burned

accounts.name: creator
docs: Authority of lp tokens

docs: Factory level encapsulation.
Primarily responsible for tracking configuration of/for Bonding Curve operations

accounts.name: mint
docs: Mint account for created Token

accounts.name: native_mint
docs: Instruction supports SPL-Token only (no Token2022 and later support)

accounts.name: fees_vault
docs: Fees are collected in only wrapped SOL (wSOL)

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Real/actual tokens held in the Bonding Curve/pool

accounts.name: native_vault
docs: NOTe: Do not use for approximate value of real lamports in a Bonding Curve!
Instead use a Token's `BondingCurve` PDA `real_lamports` field!
Real/actual lamports held in the Bonding Curve/pool

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: Token level encapsulation.
Primarily responsible for tracking state of virtual and real of Token's pool/Bonding Curve

accounts.name: token
docs: User's token balance

accounts.name: payer
docs: User's lamport balance

accounts.name: game
docs: Game encapsulation instance to collect fees from

accounts.name: native_mint
docs: Fees are only held in SPL-Token wSOL

accounts.name: fees_vault
docs: Fees are collected in only wrapped SOL (wSOL)

accounts.name: native_buffer
docs: Temporarily account to facilitate unwrapping of wSOL
Atomically opened and closed by start and end of instruction respectively

accounts.name: authority
docs: Owner of `fees_vault` and receiver of fees

accounts.name: game
docs: Factory level encapsulation.
Primarily responsible for tracking configuration of/for Bonding Curve operations

accounts.name: mint
docs: Mint account for created Token. Has to be bigger than Native Mint's key

accounts.name: metadata
docs: Has to be Unchecked because CPI instruction initializes account

docs: Instruction supports SPL-Token only (no Token2022 and later support)

Primarily responsible for tracking state of virtual and real of Token's pool/Bonding Curve

Primarily responsible for tracking configuration of/for Bonding Curve operations

docs: Append-only program level instantiation image registry for the ZK-TEE functionality

errors.name: InvalidConfig
errors.msg: Invalid Config! Try setting it to different params...

errors.name: InvalidImage
errors.msg: Invalid Image! Something unexpected happened deserializing it!

errors.name: InvalidPhase
errors.msg: Invalid phase of Game to execute instruction

errors.name: InvalidTicker
errors.msg: Invalid ticker! Must contain only letters and whitespace and maximum length of 8 characters...

errors.name: MintKeyTooSmall
errors.msg: Mint key too small! Mint key has to be greater than Native Mint Key!

errors.name: NotEnoughSolana
errors.msg: Not enough Solana to perform operation!

errors.name: NotEnoughTokens
errors.msg: Not enough tokens to perform operation!

errors.name: SlippageExceeded
errors.msg: Slippage exceeded! Try setting slippage higher...

errors.name: TokenEliminated
errors.msg: Token is eliminated! It can no longer be traded...

errors.name: WinnerHasAlreadyBeenProved
errors.msg: Winner has already been proved. The game is over

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump to identify PDA

fields.name: disable_create_pool
docs: Status to control if new pool can be create

fields.name: index
docs: Config index

fields.name: trade_fee_rate
docs: The trade fee, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: protocol_fee_rate
docs: The protocol fee

fields.name: fund_fee_rate
docs: The fund fee, denominated in hundredths of a bip (10^-6)

fields.name: create_pool_fee
docs: Fee for create a new pool

fields.name: protocol_owner
docs: Address of the protocol fee owner

fields.name: fund_owner
docs: Address of the fund fee owner

fields.name: padding
docs: padding

types.name: AnteParams
docs: The ante elimination formula is defined as step function: `𝑣(𝑡) = 𝑏 × (1 + 𝑦)^⌊𝑡/𝑥⌋`
- x is the step (measured in slots)
- y is the magnitude
- b is the offset (measured in market cap in lamports)

fields.name: x
docs: Step

fields.name: y
docs: Magnitude

fields.name: b
docs: Offset

fields.name: min_steps
docs: Minimum amount of steps (full `x` intervals) to prove a winner

types.name: BondingCurve
docs: Token level encapsulation.
Primarily responsible for tracking state of virtual and real of Token's pool/Bonding Curve

fields.name: ticker
docs: Non-unique shorthand name for clients. UTF-8 String

fields.name: created_at
docs: Slot that the Token was created at

fields.name: virtual_tokens
docs: Virtual tokens the Bonding Curve/pool holds

fields.name: virtual_lamports
docs: Virtual lamports the Bonding Curve/pool holds

fields.name: real_lamports
docs: Real lamports the Bonding Curve/pool holds. Used to differentiate between global `Game` native vault

fields.name: mint
docs: Mint account for the Token that Bonding Curve is responsible for

types.name: Game
docs: Factory level encapsulation.
Primarily responsible for tracking configuration of/for Bonding Curve operations

fields.name: game_id
docs: Unique primary key. UTF-8 String.

fields.name: phase
docs: Current phase game is on

fields.name: authority
docs: Receiver of fees

fields.name: fees_vault
docs: Fees captured from the Game (only in wSOL)

fields.name: genesis_slot
docs: Tracks when `Game` is started

fields.name: config
docs: Configuration for fees and Ante step function mechanism

fields.name: creation_fee_in_lamports
docs: Constant fee users have to pay for creating tokens (fees are only in wSOL)

fields.name: trading_fee_rate_numerator
docs: Rate users have to pay for buying/selling tokens (fees are only in wSOL)

fields.name: transfer_to_raydium_fee_rate_numerator
docs: Rate the Bonding Curve pays before transferring to Raydium (fees are only in wSOL)

fields.name: ante_params
docs: The variables for the chronological (step) market cap elimination function (or known as the Ante)

types.name: Image
docs: Image contains the id for ZK-program and TEE-program to be matched against

fields.name: image_id
docs: ZK-program ID

fields.name: mrenclave
docs: TEE-program ID

types.name: Phase
docs: Game phases

fields.name: amm_config
docs: Which config the pool belongs

fields.name: pool_creator
docs: pool creator

fields.name: token_0_vault
docs: Token A

fields.name: token_1_vault
docs: Token B

fields.name: lp_mint
docs: Pool tokens are issued when A or B tokens are deposited.
Pool tokens can be withdrawn back to the original A or B token.

fields.name: token_0_mint
docs: Mint information for token A

fields.name: token_1_mint
docs: Mint information for token B

fields.name: token_0_program
docs: token_0 program

fields.name: token_1_program
docs: token_1 program

fields.name: observation_key
docs: observation account to store oracle data

fields.name: status
docs: Bitwise representation of the state of the pool
bit0, 1: disable deposit(vaule is 1), 0: normal
bit1, 1: disable withdraw(vaule is 2), 0: normal
bit2, 1: disable swap(vaule is 4), 0: normal

fields.name: mint_0_decimals
docs: mint0 and mint1 decimals

fields.name: lp_supply
docs: True circulating supply without burns and lock ups

fields.name: protocol_fees_token_0
docs: The amounts of token_0 and token_1 that are owed to the liquidity provider.

fields.name: open_time
docs: The timestamp allowed for swap in the pool.

fields.name: recent_epoch
docs: recent epoch

fields.name: padding
docs: padding for future updates

types.name: Whitelist
docs: Whitelist is an append-only program level instantiation image registry for the ZK-TEE functionality
